name: GoVeganIn60SecondswithLouRiley
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Many who are curious about a vegan lifestyle often have no idea where to begin. This flash briefing is designed to provide daily bite-sized tips that will increase your knowledge about going vegan while also providing some real-life healthy hacks to help modify your relationship with food.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
